Name: Beatcrash
About the game: Beatcrash is a game that defeats a flying object according to the beat of music. You definitely get a workout with this game. You can catch flying weapons and a bomb. This game uses your MP3 audio files. The touch area can be set and currently 3 modes are available (Room Scale, Standing Mode, Sit Mode) Supports English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean. You can also directly edit the language file in the language folder.
Meta Title: Beatcrash: May 7, 2019, HGsofts and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Beatcrash? Check out the release date (May 7, 2019), developer insights from HGsofts, and a complete game summary.
